title: ADCP Task
description: ADCP extension of A2A Task. Extends a2a-task.json to use adcp-task-status.json and adcp-message.json for validation, enabling task-specific validation of parts[].data.

status.description: The current status of a Task, including state and a message (ADCP TaskStatus with task-specific validation).

history.description: The history of interactions from a task (using ADCP Message with task-specific validation).
